name: FAQs
author: Think201

sections.description:
FAQs provide you an easiest way to add & retrieve Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) for your website.

Salient Features

  • Create as many FAQ as you want
  • Create FAQ Categories

  • Also, you may choose the UI style you want to display FAQ on your site

  • Like the plugin or want features? Tweet to us @think201

  • Also you can read more about the plugin & its development at Think201 Labs

Plugin Support

Dedicated Support: talk to us on Twitter @think201

To raise issues or if you have a question for us, post to the support forum here https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/faqs and we are happy to help.

Requirements

  • WordPress 3.5.2 or greater
  • PHP 5.2.6 or greater (5.3 recommended)
  • MySQL 4.1.2 or greater (5.x recommended)
sections.installation:
1. Download [faqs.zip](TODO: URL to be inserted)
  2. Upload the ‘faqs.zip’ file from the Plugins->Add New page in the WordPress administration panel.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Work flow Explained

Once FAQs plug-in is installed and activated, you can see FAQs on the sidebar menu section.

  1. Start adding FAQs information from Dashboard page by clicking on Add New FAQ.
sections.faq:
Something isn’t working. Help!

  • First try deactivating and reactivating the plugin
  • If that doesn’t fix the problem, try deleting and reinstalling the plugin
  • If that doesn’t work, you should file a bug report.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First commit to the WP repository.

1.0.1

  • Minor issues fixing
  • Links & content added.
